comments.author: Vilwarin
comments.content:
Wow it is strange to hear, how you just like us also started at some point and had the same problems and worries.

Thx for sharing this with us again, it really gives a good account of an first impression of Atsugi. Alas I started my blog only later, so that I starts somewhere in the middle and doesn't say anything about first impressions - now reading this made me think about my first weeks here ^_^

Luckily I was so nice welcommed by you and the others, that I had a lot less worries :)

mika
